candidates.title: Release 5.0.0-rc.1
candidates.body: [bot] Release wasmer version 5.0.0-rc.1

candidates.title: Resolve double-free error in c-api
candidates.body:
As per title. 

The previous signature took ownership of the value, causing it to be release entirely. Now, we release the pointee, but not the pointer itself.

Closes #5141

candidates.title: Merge 5.0 release candidate into main
candidates.body: As per title.

candidates.title: Remove deprecated methods and types
candidates.body: Closes #5099

candidates.title: feat(api/build/v8): Use blob to build v8
candidates.body:
[wee8-custom-builds](https://github.com/wasmerio/wee8-custom-builds) is a repo akin to [llvm-custom-builds](https://github.com/wasmerio/llvm-custom-builds) that builds [v8](https://v8.dev/) in [wee8](https://chromium.googlesource.com/v8/v8.git/+/6516b1ccbe6f549d2aa2fe24510f73eb3a33b41a/BUILD.gn#3864) mode producing an archive containing the necessary static libraries to build `wasmer` with the `v8` feature enabled. 

This patch
1. removes the v8-[cmake](https://github.com/bnoordhuis/v8-cmake) submodule
2. downloads the archive and uses its contents during linking
3. introduces a copy of the [wasm.h ](https://github.com/v8/v8/blob/main/third_party/wasm-api/wasm.h)header from the v8 repo

candidates.title: Upgrade `rkyv`
candidates.body:
This patch bumps the version of `rkyv` used throughout the codebase from 0.7.x to 0.8.x. 

Note: many of the failing CI tests are to be resolved as-we-go in the current effort for 5.0.

candidates.title: Experimental: Add support for v8
candidates.body:
Use [`v8`](https://v8.dev/) as a backend for wasmer.

Note: this PR builds on the work for `wasmi` - related PR [here](https://github.com/wasmerio/wasmer/pull/5129). 

(Closes #5078, fixes RUN-428)

candidates.title: Release 4.4.0
candidates.body: [bot] Release wasmer version 4.4.0

candidates.title: Experimental: Add support for WASMI
candidates.body:
Use [`wasmi`](https://github.com/wasmi-labs/wasmi) as a backend for `wasmer`.

Note: this PR builds on the work for `wamr` - related PR [here](https://github.com/wasmerio/wasmer/pull/4515). 

(Closes #5114, fixes RUN-446)

candidates.title: Implement proper executable spawn
candidates.body: This PR adds support for `exec-name` annotation for overriding the name that is passed to an executable as arg0. Also, previously when spawning a command using `execve`, the args and env vars specified in the manifest for that command, were not passed along properly. This would break some commands that expect specific env vars or args to function properly.

candidates.title: Add the right to fetch stats on pipes
candidates.body:
This PR adds the right to fetch the stats of file descriptors returned by the `fd_pipe` syscall.

Resolves #5080.

candidates.title: feat(cli): Restore packages from webcs
candidates.body:
Allow "package unpack" to restore packages

Add a new --format option to package unpack.

* package: Try to restore a usable package dir with a wasmer.toml
* webc: just unpack the webc

Also adds a new wasmer-package crate that can hold package related functionality.

As a drive-by chore, also lifts pretty_assertions to be a workspace dependency.

Closes #5085

candidates.title: Various cleanup chores + add a new test
candidates.body:
- **build: Ignore direnv related files**
- **refactor: Remove edge-schema dependency**
- **chore: Remove unused generate_deploy_token function**
- **deps: lift base64 into a workspace dependency**
- **chore: Remove unused code from backend-api**
- **chore: Remove commented out command and add a note**
- **deps: Update Cargo.lock**
- **chore: Fix warning in test**
- **tests: Add WasiRunner file system mounting tests**

candidates.title: LLVM update
candidates.body:
(Closes #5062)

An in-progress effort to upgrade LLVM.

(Note: this PR builds on the state of this other PR: #5019)

candidates.title: Add feature for objects' sizes estimation
candidates.body:
(Closes #5084, fixes RUN-400)

This PR adds support for feature-gated memory usage information retrieval through [loupe](https://github.com/wasmerio/loupe).

candidates.title: Post Release: bump up webc version
Release 4.3.7
candidates.body: [bot] Release wasmer version 4.3.7

candidates.title: refactor volumes schema
candidates.body:
This PR refactors volumes so that the schema is as follows:

```yaml
volumes:
  - name: volume1
    mount: /volume1
  - name: volume2
    mount: /volume2
```

candidates.title: Add `cwd` to the manifest as a command annotation
candidates.body:
Adds support for specifying the working directory for each command as a wasi annotation. For example:

```toml
[command.annotations.wasi]
cwd = "/data"
```

candidates.title: Reduce overhead of chunk timeouts in wasix package downloads
candidates.body:
Closes #5052

Closes RUN-414

candidates.title: Remove serde_cbor as a dependency
candidates.body: Resolves #5041.

candidates.title: CLI: Volumes commands
candidates.body:
Add volumes commands to the CLI:

* app volume s3-credentials
* app volume list


- **feat(backend-api): Update schema + add volumes queries**
- **feat(cli): Add "app volumes" commands**

Closes #4985 
Closes RUN-384

candidates.title: Allow nested mounted paths in `UnionFilesystem`
candidates.body:
This PR adds support for nested mounted paths such as:
```toml
[fs]
"/app/a" = "a"
"/app/b" = "b"
```
when using the `UnionFilesystem`.
